name: Red Fort (Lal Qila)
description: UNESCO World Heritage site symbolizing Mughal grandeur.

name: India Gate
description: A national monument honoring soldiers, perfect for evening strolls.

name: Lotus Temple
description: Iconic Baha'i House of Worship shaped like a lotus flower.

name: Qutub Minar
description: The world's tallest brick minaret with stunning carvings.

name: Chandni Chowk
description: Famous for street food, spice markets, and traditional shopping.
